website_summaries.verdict: Strong and sturdy and works for both shaving and skincare needs.
pros: Impact your current design with touches for chrome that won't rust
Responsive customer service that will assist with product-related problems
An effective fogless mirror that's strong enough to hold bath towels
cons: Excess moisture may cause the mirror to fall
Locking suction cup can be difficult to get working

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to possibly be able to see in the shower. This comes with a back mount piece that I could never get to stick to my shower wall not matter what I did. The mount not sticking means it definitely wont hold any weight and the mirror is "fogless" because you fill the mirror with water in order to use it and then hang it on the mount that no one in my house could ever get to stick. Would never buy again and was a waste of time and money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Becker

customer_reviews.title: Yes, but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this soap dish. It looks very classy and was easy to mount. The only negative is that every now and then (weeks apart), I hear the "clunk" that's the sound of it hitting the floor for no apparent reason. I just remount it - it's certainly nothing that would make me not want to use it, and maybe I just happened to get a slightly defective one. I actually would recommend it if anyone asked.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Santa

customer_reviews.title: Works great, on glass!
customer_reviews.text: Great shower mirror. Can't attach, for long, on tile. Glass is working much better. I like the ease of picking up the mirror to rinse it off in the shower. Doesn't fog that bad. If you fill with water and heat up the mirror it won't either, but I shave quicker than that......seems wasteful on the water....
customer_reviews.author: Erik Okerholm

customer_reviews.title: Loses its seal after some time
customer_reviews.text: Like the hook. Its very large in size to hold a lot of things. We have 2 that we just use to hang wash cloths. As other reviewers mentioned, they lose suction and fall after a few weeks without any heavy weight on them. Annoying, but they look pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: KSS

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working fine for now
customer_reviews.text: Stayed on okay for about a month. Then it fell off randomly. After the second reinstalling, I took a shower immediately after, and the moisture may have caused it to fall a second time. In the latest install, I thoroughly wiped down the pad and wall with disinfectant wipes, left it to dry for a few hours. Then placed just the pad on the wall and let it sit overnight. Installed the rest in the morning, and did not use the bathroom until later than night. Seems to be working fine for now, but will revert if it falls again. Looks great though.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Dont let it fall
customer_reviews.text: I had it up for a month or two before it just fell down in the middle of the night unfortunately splitting in few pieces and the seal no longer works. The anti fog feature no longer works because of this unfortunately. Which worked amazing before this. It is a great mirror just make sure it stays strongly attached. Now it doesnt work so well for me. Looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best shower mirror
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror. Best shower mirror I've ever had. Use it every day and suction cup works great - hasn't fallen once.
customer_reviews.author: Jon H.

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick
customer_reviews.text: Tried sticking it on several times, did everything according to instructions, it keeps falling off 5 minutes after being installed.
customer_reviews.author: EAbaikal

customer_reviews.title: Good gripping fog free mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror that sticks well and stays fog free. Oh, also had an issue and contacted Oxo and they totally stand behind their products!
customer_reviews.author: Father of 4

customer_reviews.title: they look nice but they do not stick well to porcelain tile
customer_reviews.text: they look nice but they do not stick well to porcelain tile. They did work well on a tub surround.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: Falls off shower tiled wall in 20-30 mins.
customer_reviews.text: Falls off shower tiled wall in 20-30 mins. every time. I've cleaned the area with alcohol to no avail. This is a walk in shower in a hew home. Has smooth tile wall. It does not work. Request a credit or refund. Thx Tony
customer_reviews.author: tgros

customer_reviews.title: Gamer Changer
customer_reviews.text: In shower shave is life changing. This item costs less than a razor and has revolutionized my shave experience. It is a must buy for those without a mirror installed in their shower.
customer_reviews.author: Drosenbeast

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Won't stay up to save its life. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this item
customer_reviews.text: Fell off the shower wall in 6 months and could not put back
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and  hold 2 towels each!
customer_reviews.text: Great for tile showers where you don’t want to put screws into the wall. Stylish and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sticks to shower wall better than the cheaper competition! Never falls down or rusts.worth the price
customer_reviews.author: fishpondfrog

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled into thinking this sticks!
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT stay on wall. Installed in brand new tile shower. Cleaned both tile and suction cup as directed. Nice looking product but useless. Very disappointed as OXO products are usually very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Festa

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Regretfully, this product broke within a few days which only stored a small bar a soap. It's a great design but did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Markerson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Could not get it to stay put. It would seem solid and then hit the floor a few days in. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: danielle bojorquez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and good price for the product. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay P.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Nice size and installs easily but the anti fogging part is just nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: My Review for you.

customer_reviews.title: Product worked till it fell off wall.
customer_reviews.text: It does work, however after having it for a little while it fell off the wall when my husband was in the shower and so now when you put water in it, the water leaks from the bottom. We took it apart to see if there was a way to fix it but after putting back together it still leaks. When it was holding water though it did a great job from keeping the mirror from not fogging up. I would recommend this but just make sure that it has a firm grip to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C. Derichsweiler

customer_reviews.title: Choose carefully
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, but it’s poorly designed. Hook stays on my bathroom wall tile most of the time, but it will fall off for no reason at all (I don’t hang wet towels, heavy clothes, etc.). Difficult to install. I purchased a similar stick-on toilet paper holder (of a different make), but rather than just using a suction cup, the cup itself has to be tightened clockwise until it seals. While it fell a couple of times because I did not put enough pressure to form a tight seal, I’ve had no problems with it falling from my bathroom tile despite using mega-size toilet paper rolls & a pulling motion.
customer_reviews.author: poms’npomchi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Great suction and look. I use it to hold poufs and it looks fantastic. Much better than storing the poufs over the shower handle.
customer_reviews.author: Naved

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This shower soap holder is great! It is sharp looking and SO easy to attach to the shower wall and holds strong. The fact that the white insert comes out to clean is a big plus. Love OXO!
customer_reviews.author: Austin B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Product adhere's well to the marble shower wall and is strong enough to hold my towel. Looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: MsCSG

customer_reviews.title: so good. The suction seems to be strong
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. The suction seems to be strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jon STOA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds up my two bath towels on the shower door. Hasn’t fallen off yet.
customer_reviews.author: SkincareObsessed

customer_reviews.title: Best fogless mirror I've used
customer_reviews.text: Make sure the water you fill it with is as hot or hotter than what you are going to use and it wont fog up once the mirror warms up.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Used on shower wall -adhered well to marble surface-well priced-nice quality
customer_reviews.author: judy m binder

customer_reviews.title: Stays stuck on the wall
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different suction cup soap dishes over the years and they never stick well and fall off eventually. They all get thrown away within a few months. However, OXO Good Grips Suction Soap dish is fantastic!!!!!!! This thing STICKS and doesn't budge. I put in on the bathroom wall a month ago and it's still stuck firmly to the wall. The chrome plating is still in great shape and the holes do a great job of draining the water of my soap so the bars don't disintegrate in the dish. I'm really happy with this product and will be looking at what other bath products they offer.
customer_reviews.author: The Modernist Medium

customer_reviews.title: Poor QC? Falls off within a few hours (though my other oxo suction dish works great)
customer_reviews.text: This is my second good grips suction soap holder. The other one (this guy:  was great, so I had high hopes for this one, which has a nicer look. But this one won't keep suction and falls off after a couple of hours. Cleaned and installed as directed, on a mirror. I tried repeatedly with a regular 3oz bar of soap, then switched to a hotel bar, then empty. Seemed secure installed, but would be on the floor a couple hours later every time. I'm assuming it's defective, since our other oxo suction holder has no issues and has stayed up for months. Oxo is typically super reliable. Not up to the usual Oxo standards.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased and honestly a little surprised this has been holding on my shower wall for almost a month with my family of four. I will not claim to have an updated shower nor will I say that this holder makes my shower look like something out of a magazine. None the less, it is a nice plastic holder with a chrome appearance and seems to be doing a spectacular job! Cleaning and removing the tray is simple as the installation process.
customer_reviews.author: Redz

customer_reviews.title: Super simple install, great suction & great drainage!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great soap dish design with super simple installation, great suction, great drainage, and just as easy to remove as to install. Much better than the ceramic tile dishes that get scummy and wet from your soap, this drains, dries, and can easily be washed and removed. The two part installation allows you to leave the suction cup in place while removing the dish for cleansing. The suction cup is a vast improvement over typical suction cups, and holds incredibly well. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rivendell

customer_reviews.title: Suction Failed in Year Three
customer_reviews.text: Three years later I can report that the suction finally failed, but that's a pretty good report. IN fact, the suction failure might have been due to dirty tile ... not sure. Anyway, a basic and workable soap dish.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: All parts of thisnsoapmdish are plastic. It comes in two parts. Simply out the white plastic part on the wall and turn the lever down to activate the suction cup. It is now firmly attached. Then add the dish which has a metallic chrome finish. The dish itself has holes for drainage that drips out and down to the shower or tub. Once the dish is installed you can twist it to become level. Rating 5 stars = Love It.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineMM

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a bathroom remodel project. It has held for a week with no slips or releases. I like that I could put it up higher since my husband is tall and now he doesn't have to bend in half to get soap. It was easy to install and seems like it will be very easy to clean and potentially reposition if needed. It's lightweight but is well made and should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: A. Looby

customer_reviews.title: Easily installed and looks good
customer_reviews.text: This is surely easy to install. If it's easy for this 84 year old to attach, anyone can do it. It looks good and won't fall off. It's plastic and what else would you expect for that price? Actually, I think that's so much the better since plastic won't break if by chance it does fall off. It works well in my apartment shower and I recommend it to all.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: A great product from OXO, one that looks nice and not difficult to install. I actually placed it in a bad spot the first time and removing and repositioning it was not the headache I expected. The suction is actually very strong and I have not noticed any slipage or unsteadiness. A slot in the dish helps to prevent soap buildup. The dish also snaps off for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip O.

customer_reviews.title: OXO does a great job engineering things and this soap dish isn’t different
customer_reviews.text: OXO does a great job engineering things and this soap dish isn’t different. It looks great to boot. When they say it looks built in, that’s a stretch but not by much. It is very secure once you mount it.
customer_reviews.author: anonymousY

customer_reviews.title: won't hold
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a month ago and at first I thought it was great and gave it 5 stars. However, since that time it’s fell off my shower wall twice. When you first install it the suction seems solid but over time it obviously loses hold and falls off making it useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: PC Mountain

customer_reviews.title: Frees up space on the sink
customer_reviews.text: We have old-fashioned pedestal sinks in our bathrooms. There's no room to set anything down on the sink. This soap dish solves one problem for us, getting the soap off the sink and freeing up space for other things. Our walls are plaster (this old house!), so we can't put screws into the wall. I've been leery of items that rely on suction, though. What if they don't hold? This two-part suction dish seems like it will hold well, with a locking mechanism to hold it in place. The chrome finish works well in our bathrooms -- I know more updated bathrooms are using nickle finishes and the like, but I'm glad the chrome items are still available.
customer_reviews.author: N. B. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This dish was easy to attach to glass and tile. It stays up pretty well too! I've dropped it a couple times in the process of moving it around and it's not broken, also a plus! My one qualm with it is that the white plastic really ruins the look and makes it look a lot cheaper than one might be going for if one is getting a chrome soap dish. A clear, harder plastic would have worked better for me. I feel like the chrome with white plastic is more obvious than the plain, clear plastic soap dish I had up previously.
customer_reviews.author: CCE

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Soap Dish
customer_reviews.text: I have never been disappointed in any of the many OXO household items I own and this one is no exception. This soap dish not only looks nice, but the suction is quite powerful. Make sure you have it positioned in the place you want it as once you adhere it, it is there to stay! It is also easy to keep clean as it drains well.
customer_reviews.author: BeatleBangs1964

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to install. I love that it is removable so I can run it through the dishwasher from time to time to really get it clean. It is really secure and will not fall down. It's a tension suction which is more effective that just a standard suction cup. It looks nice and functions perfectly. It keeps the soap in great condition, with a proper amount of drainage.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice soap dish that drains, with strong suction cups!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, strong suction; soap dish drains. Chrome rim add a sleek look to the shower. What's not to like? Finally I can keep my scented soap bars inside the shower with me as they won't just "melt away." Very happy with this little product.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Todd

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips Chrome Suction Fogless Shower Mirror
product_meta.description: Style:Fogless MirrorFor a professional look without the need for professional tools (or skills!) try the OXO chrome suction line. This line of bathroom organization products looks like built-in hardware, but attach using suction. (Your guests would never know it!) a rustproof chrome cover locks on top of the phthalate-free stronghold suction cup for a permanent look with the tool-free and adjustable convenience of suction.
feature_bullets: Rustproof chrome finish and hidden suction cup provide a professionally installed look
Secures to walls using sturdy, phthalate-free Stronghold suction cup
Suction cup is hidden for a permanent look with tool-free installation
Fill back reservoir with hot water before each shower for a clear view of mirror
Hot water equalizes mirror and air temperature to prevent condensation and fog
Mirror is easy to remove, refill and replace without adjusting suction cup
For best results, use on smooth glazed surfaces, mirrors or glass. Not recommended for use with textured or porous surfaces including some stone, acrylic or metal

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars138 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
